alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 8:59AM AKST until February 03 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of freezing rain expected. Additional 1 to 3 inches of snow expected. Ice accumulation less than one quarter inch. * WHERE...Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area including Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. Ice and snow accumulation may bring down trees, power lines, and weakened structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Multiple rounds of wintry precipitation expected over the next few days. As of 8 AM AKST, around 7 inches of snow was reported in Yakutat. Light snow showers and periods of freezing drizzle are expected through the rest of today and tonight. A second round of heavy snow and/or freezing rain is expected Thursday morning before a transition to all rain Thursday afternoon. Confidence is low regarding the exact timing of the transition to rain and the freezing rain potential Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
